mmd:mmd.mmd:title: "CLMcom-CCLM4-8-17 model output prepared for CORDEX historical"
mmd:mmd.mmd:abstract:
These are bias corrected data sets for the CLIPC project.
Bias correction was done using fitQmapQUANT from R-package qmap.

bc_info: "METNO-QMAP-MESAN-1989-2010"
bc_observation: "The regional reanalysis MESAN has been generated in the EURO4M FP7 project (http://www.euro4m.eu/ Grant agreement no. 242093); http://www.euro4m.eu/downloads/D2.4_Improved_MESAN_downscaled_dataset_at_3-12_km_resolution_for_most_of_the_past_20_yr_period.pdf"
driving_model_ensemble_member: "r1i1p1"
driving_model_id: "CNRM-CERFACS-CNRM-CM5"
model_id: "CLMcom-CCLM4-8-17"
CORDEX_domain: "EUR-11"
Variable: prAdjust

Before using the data, have a look at https://wiki.met.no/clipc/start for details, updates and terms of use.

NOTE THAT THIS IS A PRELIMINARY DATASET PUBLICATION AND DATA FORMAT, AVAILABILITY AND CONTENT MAY CHANGE. PLEASE REPORT IF YOU FIND SOMETHING STRANGE IN THE DATA!
